name: places/ChIJyQw7vo9ZwokR-dTE5XCbr8k
adrFormatAddress: 622 Broadway, New York, NY 10012, USA

editorialSummary.text: Chain retailer with a large array of brand-name electronics, computers, appliances & more.

originalText.text: This outlet is on Broadway in NoHo. The store is huge and you always get options here. The store pickup option is swift and seamless. But like all other Best Buy stores there are very few representatives to help and you have to wait for a long time to get any kind of assistance or clarifications which is very irritating. But a good store in terms of options available.

text.text: This outlet is on Broadway in NoHo. The store is huge and you always get options here. The store pickup option is swift and seamless. originalText.text: I recently visited this Best Buy store and I was very impressed with the politeness and helpfulness of the staff. They were always willing to answer my questions and help me find what I was looking for. I also appreciated that they were not pushy or salesy. I would definitely recommend this store to anyone looking for a positive shopping experience just be careful as the layout might be a bit confusing so make sure to look at the store map before getting lost across its 3 floors.

originalText.text:
I may stop shopping at Best Buy. They do not check returns/open box. Here is on problem I had with this specific store, and one with the chain in general:
1. I didn't get the produce I bought for $700. I bought a gen 3 Sonos sub, open box, in EXCELLENT condition. It was NOT a Gen 3, it was Gen 2. In their defense, they look identical, except for the button on the back. However, a Gen 2 sub would retail for $600, and I paid more than that for a used product. Also, it had deep surface groove scratches on multiple sides... NOT EXCELLENT.

2. Unrelated to this specific store: I had identity theft a few years ago. Someone bought thousands in dollars worth of goods from Best Buy for curbside pickup, in Nevada. They received their goods unquestioned! When I myself have gone to pickup goods from Best Buy, they hardly check if it's actually me.

When I exchanged the product at a different Best Buy, they hardly even opened the box to check I had returned the item.

Due to this combination of simply no one caring, even a little bit, I'm bordering being done with Best Buy for good.

originalText.text: Been here multiple times, staff will approach you to ask if you have any Qs. Sometimes it can be a bit annoying if you are browsing as you will get stopped by a multitude of associates asking if you have any Qs as you walk around. But being in a tourist-y area I understand.  I usually do store pickups and those are also very easy. For some reason, it may be a faster option to ship it to your home then to have a item not available shipped to the store.

originalText.text: Great selection of items to purchase but the layout of the store is bizarre due to how the they're using the location. Took a while for someone to help me get one item so I just bought the one and left.
